SA15n1231:6: prīṇantyeva vi + + + + hi śiśoḥ prāyaḥ pitṛṇāṃ manaḥ ||
SA15n1231:11: sa cānubhavāvasito'sati bādhake pratyakṣasidvo hetorāśrayāsidviṃ nihanti |
SA15n1231:12: nanu bhavadbhirasannevāvayavī pratijñāyate sa kathaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ |
SA15n1231:13: nāvayavinamiha dharmmiṇaṃ pratipannāḥ smaḥ kintu pratibhāsamānasthūla nīlādikamartham |
SA15n1231:14: na tarhi virudvadharmmasaṃsargādavayavina ekatvaṃ niṣidvaṃ syāt |
SA15n1231:28: na paramāṇusañcayavādināṃ sthūlākāraḥ kaścidartho'sti yaḥ prasidvo dharmmī syāditi |
SA15n1231:29: avayavyanabhyupagame'pi hi niravayavānekātmakaḥ sthūlo'rthobhyupagamyamānaḥ kena niṣidvaḥ |
SA15n1231:30: syānmataṃ niravayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣe sthūlenā kāreṇāvabhāseran,
SA15n1231:33: paramāṇava eva hi pararūpadeśaparihāreṇotpannāḥ parasparasahitā avabhāsamānā deśavitānavanto bhāsante |
SA15n1231:35: yattuktaṃ sthūlasūkṣmayorvirodha iti tat kiṃ pararūpadeśaparihāravatī niravayavānāmutpattiḥ |
SA15n1231:38: ataeva niravayaveṣu bahuṣvekasmin vijñāne pratibhāsa māneṣu bhavan pratibhāsakālabhāvī pratibhāsadharmmaḥ sthūlākāro na tu vāstavaḥ pratyekamabhāvāt |
SA15n1231:39: pratibhāsāt prāgūrdvaṃ vā na tarhi sthūlo'rtha iti cet |
SA15n1231:40: na tadāpi pratibhāsayogyatāsambhavāt yadaiva hi sañcitā bhaveyustadaiva pratibhāsayogyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ |
SA15n1231:46: tadayaṃ nirantara eka eva sthalo niravayavānekātmako bhavitumarhati,
SA15n1231:57: tatrāpi kimeṣāmantaraṃ vivekaḥ pararūpaśūnyatā veti cintyaṃ |
SA15n1231:60: nanu ca na pratyekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ sthūlākāraḥ |
SA15n1231:62: yathā ca nīlaparamāṇūnāṃ pratyekamasambhavan pītākāro bahuṣvapi na dṛśyate |
SA15n1231:63: tathā pratyekamasambhavan sthūlākāraḥ kathaṃ bahuṣu syāditi |
SA15n1231:66: tataḥ pītavirudvaṃ nīlākāraṃ vibhrāṇeṣu bahuṣvapi kathaṃ pītākāro bhavet |
SA15n1231:68: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ sthūlo'rtha iha dharmmīti vyavasthitaṃ |
SA15n1231:69: tadevamavasthite dharmmiṇi hetoḥ sattvamasattvaṃ vā nirūpyaṃ |
SA15n1231:70: tatra pāṇyādāvekasmin kampamāne sthūlo'rthaḥ sakampaniḥkampe rūpe yugapat pratipadyamānaḥ kathaṃ virudvadharmmasaṃsargavānna syāt |
SA15n1231:74: iha ca sakampaniḥkampe rūpe gṛhṇat pratyakṣameva sāmarthyāt parasparābhāvaṃ sādhayati |
SA15n1231:76: syādetat pāṇyādāvekasminnavayave kampamāne nāvayavinaḥ kampa rūpamabhyupeyaṃ |
SA15n1231:77: avayava eva hi tadā kriyāvān dṛśyate |
SA15n1231:80: yathā rathe calati tadā rūḍho'pi calatīti |
SA15n1231:86: yadā tu śarīrakampanārthaḥ prayatnaviśeṣa ātmano jāyate |
SA15n1231:88: ato bhinnamiti tayorekasmin jāte kathaṃ nimittāntarapratibadvajanmā tadabhāve tadaparo'pi tathaiva jāyeta |
SA15n1231:89: ratha tadārūḍhakarmmaṇostu satyapi nimittabhede nimittayaugapadyāt sahabhāvaḥ |
SA15n1231:92: tayośca sahabhāvāt karmmaṇī api yaugapadyena jāyete |
SA15n1231:97: tena ca saṃyoge'samavāyikāraṇe nivarttate nivarttetāvayavi dravyamiti |
SA15n1231:106: anyathāvayavasaṃsṛṣṭebhya ākāśadeśebhyo vibhāgo'vayavāsaṃsṛṣṭeśca saṃyogovayavinaḥ kriyāvataḥ syāt |
SA15n1231:114: tasmādavayavini kriyāvati avayavāḥ kriyāvanta ityakāmakairapi vaiśeṣikairidamabhyupeyaṃ |
SA15n1231:115: yathā cāvayavikriyāyāmavayavāḥ kriyāvanta stathāvayaveṣvapi kriyāvatsu tadavayavaiḥ kriyāvadbhirbhāvyamiti |
SA15n1231:116: anayā diśā dvyaṇuke kriyāvati tadārambhakau paramāṇūkriyāvantau mantavyau |
SA15n1231:121: ekasya paramāṇoḥ kriyā na parasyeti cet |
SA15n1231:124: evañca bdyaṇukadravyasya kriyāvattve tryaṇuke'pi kriyā syādityanena krameṇa paridṛśyamāno'calaścalaḥ syādavayavaḥ |
SA15n1231:128: sāvayavo hi bhāva ekenāvayavena vastvantarasaṃyukta evāvayavāntarai ścalaiḥ |
SA15n1231:132: tathāhyāvṛte ekasmin pāṇyādau sthūlasyārthasyāvṛtānāvṛte rūpe yugapadbhavantī virudvadharmmadvayasaṃyogamasyāvedayataḥ |
SA15n1231:143: na cārdvāvaraṇe bhūyasāmavayavānāmastīndriyasannikarṣaḥ tato na sthūlagrahaṇamiti |
SA15n1231:149: atha sthūlatvākhyaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo guṇaḥ sa drabyādanya eveti cet |
SA15n1231:156: yadyevaṃ sa eva tarhyavayavaḥ svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratyakṣostvāvaraṇakālenāvayavī |
SA15n1231:159: yasya hi mahato'vayavasya tata parimāṇaṃ sa tāvat svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratibhāti |
SA15n1231:160: avayavinaśca tatparimāṇasambadvapratibhāsābhyupagame dvayoḥ samaparimāṇayorayavāyavavinoḥ pratibhāsa āsajyate |
SA15n1231:163: syādetadyasyāvayavasya parimāṇenāvayavī sambadvaḥ pratibhāti sa svaṃ parimāṇaṃ parityajyābhātīti |
SA15n1231:166: na ca bādhakamantareṇa bhrāntirapi śakyā vyavasthāpayitum |
SA15n1231:169: paramadhyāvarttināmavayavānāmindriyasannikarṣābhāve sthūlatamāvayavidarśanānupapatteḥ syānmataṃ nikhilā vayavadarśanaṃ na sthūlapratyakṣakāraṇaṃ |
SA15n1231:173: tato na yāvanniravaśeṣāvayavadarśanaṃ tāvat kathaṃ sthūlatamārthapratipattiḥ syāt |
SA15n1231:176: krameṇa diśāmavayavānāṃ pratyakṣīkaraṇe pratyakṣaḥ sthūlo'vayavīti cet |
SA15n1231:177: anyadā tu kaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti vimṛṣyaṃ |
SA15n1231:179: avayavī api paramadhyavarttino na yugapaddṛśyanta iti kathaṃ so'pi pratyakṣaḥ syāt |
SA15n1231:180: tadevaṃ nāvayavī nāvayavāḥ pratyakṣā iti na kiñcidṛśyeteti |
SA15n1231:183: tathā hyekasminnukte sthulo'rtho raktārakte rūpe yugapat pratipadyamāno virudvarūpadvayayogamātmanaḥ prakāśayati |
SA15n1231:184: nanva vayava eva rakto'vayavī tvaraktaikarūpa eveti |
SA15n1231:188: avayavasya ca rāgadravyeṇa saṃyoge'vayavino'pi tena bhāvyaṃ |
SA15n1231:189: avaśyaṃ hi kāraṇasaṃyoginā kāryyamapi saṃyujyata iti samayāt |
SA15n1231:191: asti hi kuṅkumārakte paṭāvayave kuṅkumāraktaḥ paṭa iti pratyayaḥ |
SA15n1231:192: tato rāgadravyasaṃyukta evāvayavīti tasyāpi varṇāntarānavabhāsaḥ syādavayavinaḥ |
SA15n1231:193: rāgadravyaṃ hi pratyāsīdat nijarūpaṃ vastuna stirodhatte svena ca rūpeṇa dravyaṃ sambandhati |
SA15n1231:194: yathā raktovayavastirohitasahajarūpo rāgadravyasamavāyinā rūpeṇa sambandhī pratibhāti |
SA15n1231:202: yadi hi svāśraye samaveto rūpādivat vyāpyavṛttirevāyaṃ |
SA15n1231:208: abhāvo hi bhāvanivṛttirūpo nāsya bhāvanivṛttiṃ hitvā rūpāntaramīkṣate |
SA15n1231:209: yaśca yannivṛttirūpaḥ sa kathaṃ tasmin satyeva bhavati |
SA15n1231:211: tathā hyanalaṃ paśyannapi salilārthī tatra pravartteta |
SA15n1231:215: nanu tatra yadi jalaṃ syādupalabhyeta kimataḥ |
SA15n1231:223: tatra bhāvanivṛttirūpe 'bhāve sidve kathaṃ bhāvopalabdhirna bhrāntā syāt |
SA15n1231:227: rūparasayostu na parasparanivṛttī rūpamiti kathaṃ tadudāharaṇamiha śobheta |
SA15n1231:236: iha tāvadekasmin deśe paricchidyamāne tādrūpyapracyutirasya vyavacchidyate |
SA15n1231:239: yadi hi paricchidyamāno deśāntarasvabhāvo bhavettadā tadrūpa evopalabdho bhavet |
SA15n1231:240: deśāntararūpantu virahayya svena rūpeṇa prakāśamāno deśo deśāntarāsaṃsṛṣṭa ityavasīyate |
SA15n1231:241: yathā ca deśasya deśāntarāsaṃsargastathā tenādhārabhūtena deśena yadyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadapi deśāntarasaṃsargādavicchinnaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1231:242: kathaṃ hi tena deśena vyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadabhāvavati deśāntare vartteta |
SA15n1231:243: yathā ekena deśena vyāpto ghaṭo na deśāntare varttate |
SA15n1231:247: yaduta ekadeśavyāptaṃ rūpaṃ na deśāntare varttate iti |
SA15n1231:249: tadabhāvavati deśāntare varttamāno'pi tena deśena vyāpyeta |
SA15n1231:256: tathāhi bhāvābhāvāveva parasparaparihāreṇa virudvau na vastunī |
SA15n1231:258: tena yadeva vastu vastvantarapracyutimat tadeva tena virudvaṃ |
SA15n1231:261: ekakāryyanirvarttanaśaktimati ca rūpe gṛhyamāṇe kāryyāntara nirvarttanaśaktirapi paricchidyata iti |
SA15n1231:264: yathātyanta sadṛśorvastunoryugapadupalabhyamānayoḥ satyapi cākārabhede dūrādanupalakṣyamāṇabhedayordeśabhedamātranimittakaṃ pratyakṣāvasitaṃ virodhamāśritya bhedo'vasthāpyate |
SA15n1231:266: yathaikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhinneṣu cakṣurādiṣu varttate tadadhīnotpādatayā |
SA15n1231:268: so'pi deśabhedanimitte virodhe'vasthāpyamāne vastunaḥ kāraṇabhedanimittaṃviro dhamāsañjayan na naipuṇyamātmano nivedayati |
SA15n1231:279: tadevaṃ kamparāgāvaraṇabhāvābhāvakṛte deśabhedanibandhane ca caturthe virudvadharmmasaṃsarge'vayaviviṣaye vyavasthāpite pakṣadharmmatvaṃ sidvaṃ hetoḥ |
SA15n1231:284: tato virudvadharmmasaṃsarge'pi bhavannabhedavyavahāro vyāpakaṃ nimittavattvaṃ jahyāt |
